.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder UseQnAMakerSettings(class Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder builder, string botRoot, string qnaRegion, string environment) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseQnAMakerSettings (builder As IConfigurationBuilder, botRoot As String, qnaRegion As String, environment As String) As IConfigurationBuilder
static member UseQnAMakerSettings : Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder * string * string * string -> Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder

Docs.param: Language region for QnA, e.g, en-us.
Running enviroment, e.g, development or alias.
Docs.summary: Setup configuration to utilize the settings file generated by bf qnamaker:build.
Docs.remarks: This will pick up --environment as the environment to target. If environment is Development it will use the name of the logged in user. This will pick up --root as the root folder to run in.
